detailedSummary: Days of the week in Japanese: Getsuyoubi (Monday), Kayoubi (Tuesday), Suiyoubi (Wednesday), Mokuyoubi (Thursday), Kinyoubi (Friday), Doyoubi (Saturday), Nichiyoubi (Sunday).
whyItMatters: Mastering Days of the Week is essential for building a strong foundation in japanese - these basic concepts are the first building blocks for all future language learning.
